hero_title: We believe the web should be *fast for everyone*
hero_subtitle: DC Website started with a simple frustration: too many tools make the web slower. We set out to build the opposite — a platform where performance and accessibility are the default, not afterthoughts.
values_subtitle: Every decision we make filters through three non-negotiable values.

values.title: Performance is a feature
values.text: Every millisecond matters to your users. We benchmark obsessively so you never have to apologize for a slow page.

values.title: Accessibility by default
values.text: 15% of the world lives with a disability. Building accessible experiences isn’t charity — it’s reaching your full audience.

values.title: Simplicity scales
values.text: Complexity is a liability. We ship fewer features that work perfectly rather than dozens that almost work.

cta_text: We’re always looking for people who care about craft. See open roles or reach out directly.
